author: jm
msg: split up MsgContainer into two new classes - Message, for top-level node, and MsgNode for sub-nodes.  Message is a subclass of MsgNode with additional features to hold metadata, pristine message representation and top-level message-wide flags

author: jm
msg: moved finish_metadata() call in PMS to finish()

author: jm
msg: oops.  make sure finish_metadata can be called multiple times
